reviewText: One of Donizetti's most poorly composed operas, not to mention the stupid production and generally poor singing.

This is a good production, great music, and great acting. The story lines is somewhat strange with Rita having a husband who turns up alive, after she marries another man. She has a habit of beating her second husband. Then, the story has to find a way to resolve the conflict. Both want to get rid of Rita. But, the issue is resolved when Rita decides to reform and her second husband keeps her.
